name: Concurrent Object-Oriented Language
short_description:
COOLis an object oriented programming language specialized for concurrent software development.

Language syntax is similar to C++ and Java. For proper documentation please read the diploma thesis (Only available in german yet).

Supported platforms:

- Windows 7 or above (32/64 bit)
- x86 processor architecture
summary: An object oriented language for concurrent software development
